weispace

weilion space station is a matrix space station for the development of space exploration ecosystem using WEI energy for the initiation process. Theoretically, the WEI energy is made from each point in the blockchain space which is block-quantized in the matrix by the chain platform source core with core multi matters, for example Binance Smart Chain, Solana or Polygon... Chain platform source cores are encrypted in unique NFT form as a unique matter in blockchain space exploration.

  • purpose
  • advantages
  • Explore the endless universe and the most advanced technologies.
  • Expanding matrix Mission
  • Create a space-cosmic matrix through an infinitely expanding blockchain platform
  • Simulate and test logical hypotheses from the weilion energy source into space through the Blockchain ecosystem
  • Convert discoveries to NFT assets and create a common playing field
  • Search for life on planets in space.
weilion space station is a matrix space station for the development of space exploration ecosystem using WEI energy for the initiation process. Theoretically, the WEI energy is made from each point in the blockchain space which is block-quantized in the matrix by the chain platform source core with core multi matters, for example Binance Smart Chain, Solana or Polygon... Chain platform source cores are encrypted in unique NFT form as a unique matter in blockchain space exploration.

  • orbit
  • modules

The Big Bang from the ledger in 2009 gave birth to the concept of blockchain space with multi-technology Galaxies created and spreading out all over the universe, which formed an ecosystem in the digital space.

The countless Galaxies in the blockchain space that are formed by space influences and energy leaks from the Ethereum Galaxy make the planetary core diversity.

The blockchain space matrix can be parallel to the physical world; however, it can be limited by different principles on each planet in the Galaxies.

The blockchain space has been expanding at an unbelievable pace, which has triggered the outburst of new energy cores, creating planets and forming different Galaxies.

The planetary systems around the energy core use the core energy to maintain and expand these Galaxies further and further

weilion space station

Weilion is the first project to hold its own NFT (asset) space station.

Weilion is the first project to build contemporary and future works by available resources (Token).

The construction of a space station or module or structural work on the moon or Mars requires the project to pay a token amount of equivalent value in the platform environment for the time being; such payment will be put into the global staking pool so that all long-term holders can profit from staking.

Weilion will allow residents to experience and grow in stages even though the detailed roadmap has not been revealed, all of which are surprising discoveries.

wei mong

WEIMONG is the mascot that astronauts always take with them when going into space, representing one of the preparation steps for the journey into space. Weimong builds an ecosystem to help users entertain and earn more NFT.
go to now>>>

roadmap

Q4 2021

  • 1.1 (Q4 2021): Inception of Weilion
    • Concept introduction
    • Weilion Website
    • Weimong Concept Art (2D)
  • 1.2 (Q4 2021): Building the foundation
    • Weimong Roadmap
    • Weilion Whitepaper
    • Weimong Website
  • 1.3 (Q1 2022): Collaboration with studios
    • Weimong Game Concepts (2D)
    • Marketplaces on Weilion
  • 1.4 (Q1 2022): Parallel setup of the primary platform
    • Setup of Weilion Space Modules (3D) Concept Art studio on VR
    • Weimong-box pre-sale
  • 1.5 (Q2 2022): Launch and release of the first 2D platform
    • Alpha test weimong 1
    • Alpha test weimong 2
    • Weimong game opening
    • Mysterious gift box that allows reassembly and use
  • 1.6 (Q2 2022): Foundation development
    • Expansion of game maps on Weimong

Q4 -2022

  • 2.1 (Q4 2022): Launch of Weilion Space on VR technology phase 1
    • Register for space station visits
    • Participate in outer space activities and experiences
    • Contemplate the earth from space
    • Communicate with space crews and members on the station
    • Learn as well as provide a vision of the further future in the matrix
  • 2.2 (Q1 2023): Development of Modules with functions for the Weilion station ecosystem (NFTs)
    • Modules with scientific research functional chambers, culture farm, Provide the station with additional oxygen data as well as exploit other data.

Q2 - 2023

  • 3.1 (Q2 2023): Launch of Weilion Space on VR technology phase 2
    • Develop satellites (NFTs) and landers (NFTs) to explore the Moon
    • Explore the moon and send images (NFTs)
    • Set up the Moon lit part lander programme
    • Select the first astronauts to set foot on the moon from countries on the crew ship
    • Marks and flags (NFT)
  • 3.2 (Q2 2023): Construction of architectural infrastructure on the moon
    • Research and build scientific research and entertainment infrastructure on the lit part of the moon. Space Architecture (NFT)
    • Set up space flights from the station to the moon and learn
    • As well as experience the virtual reality of the infrastructures.
  • 3.3: Expansion

Q2 - 2024

  • 4.1 (Q2 2024): Launch of Weilion Space on VR technology phase 3
    • Develop satellites (NFTs) and landers (NFTs) to explore the Mars
    • Explore Mars and send images from the probe satellites (NFTs)
    • Set up the Mars surface landing programme
    • Select the first astronauts to set foot on the Mars from countries on the crew ship
    • Marks and flags (NFT)
  • 4.2 (Q3 2024): Construction of limited-scale infrastructures (1)
    • Plan for infrastructural construction 1
    • Open for sale land bank 1
    • Open for sale model construction design options subject to the project plan
  • 4.3 (Q4 2024): Welcoming the first colonists of limited Mars (1)
    • Issue resident card (NFTs) to customers who own apartments on the Mars
    • Issue definite-term visas to non-resident customers
    • Build and develop communities

Q2 2025

  • Exploration of lives in the universe
